PtSituationElement.Summary: [3] train shuttle buses are detoured in both directions because of track work on Livonia between Junius St and Mother Gaston Blvd. Details at mta.info
PtSituationElement.Description: 3 train shuttle buses are detoured in both directions because of track work on Livonia between Junius St and Mother Gaston Blvd. Details at mta.info
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
[3][SB] train shuttle buses are detoured in both directions because of track work on Livonia between Junius St and Mother Gaston Blvd.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Junius St, right on New Lots Av, right on Mother Gaston Blvd, left on Livonia Av and then resume their regular route.

Eastbound: Via Livonia Av, left on Mother Gaston Blvd, right on Dumont Av, right on Junius S and then resume their regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along the detoured route.

PtSituationElement.Summary: [E] trains have service changes and delays because a train's brakes were automatically activated at World Trade Center. See mta.info
PtSituationElement.Description: E trains are running with delays in both directions because a train's brakes were automatically activated at World Trade Center.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
[E] trains are stopping along the [F] line between W 4 St-Washington Sq and 2 Av in both directions because a train's brakes were automatically activated at World Trade Center.

Expect delays in [E] and [F] train service.

PtSituationElement.Summary: [L] shuttle buses are detoured because of a road obstruction at Linden St and Wyckoff St. Details at mta.info.
PtSituationElement.Description: L, shuttle buses are detoured because of a road obstruction at Linden St and Wyckoff St. Details at mta.info.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
[L] shuttle buses are detoured because of a road obstruction at Linden St and Wyckoff St.

Detour is as follows:

Wyckoff St Bound: Via Wyckoff St, left DeKalb Av, right on Cypress Av, right on Gates Av and then resume the regular route.

Alternate travel notes:

For service from 110, 116, 125 and 137 Sts, take the M4 bus instead. Transfer to the [1] at 145 St.

PtSituationElement.Summary: SIGNAL MODERNIZATION 1215 AM Sat, Oct 13 to 10 PM Sun, Oct 14 [7] Service is replaced by [E] [F] [N] [W] [S] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses between Queensboro Plaza in Queens and 34 St-Hudson Yards in Manhattan [7]

PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
SIGNAL MODERNIZATION
12:15 AM Sat, Oct 13 to 10 PM Sun, Oct 14
[7] Service is replaced by [E] [F] [N] [W] [S] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses between Queensboro Plaza in Queens and 34 St-Hudson Yards in Manhattan


[7] Service runs between Main St and Queensboro Plaza.

[SB] Buses run in two sections:
1. In Queens, between Queensboro Plaza and Vernon Blvd-Jackson Av.
2. In Manhattan, between Times Sq-42 St and 34 St-Hudson Yards.

Special [W] service runs between Whitehall St and Ditmars Blvd during the following times:
Saturday, 7 AM to 9 PM • Sunday, 9 AM to 7 PM

[S] 42 Street Shuttle service runs overnight.

Travel Alternatives:
For service between Queens and Manhattan, take the [E] [F] [N] [W].

For [7] stations in Queens, take the [E] train and/or [SB] buses.
• Transfer at 74 St-Roosevelt Av [7] [E] [F] [R], Queensboro Plaza [7] [N] [W] [SB]

For [7] stations in Manhattan, take the [E], [F], [N], [W], [S] 42 St Shuttle or [SB] buses.
• Transfer at Times Sq-42 St [N] [S] [W] [SB] or 42 St/Port Authority [E] [SB].

PtSituationElement.Summary: SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS 1145 PM Fri, Oct 12 to 5 AM Mon, Oct 15 Jamaica-bound [F] trains are rerouted via the [E] after 47-50 Sts in Manhattan to Roosevelt Av in Queens

PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS
11:45 PM Fri, Oct 12 to 5 AM Mon, Oct 15
Jamaica-bound [F] trains are rerouted via the [E] after 47-50 Sts in Manhattan to Roosevelt Av in Queens


No Jamaica-bound service at Lexington Av/63 St, Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge.

Travel Alternatives
• For Lexington Av/63 St, take the [M]* instead. Transfer between trains at 34 St-Herald Sq.
• To Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].
• From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Alternate travel notes:
For 21 St-Queensbridge, consider nearby Queens Plaza.
For Roosevelt Island take the Q102 bus (days/evenings), via transfer at Queens Plaza.

Note:
57 St is temporarily closed for renovation.

PtSituationElement.Summary: TRACK MAINTENANCE 1045 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Weekends until Nov 19 [L] Service between between Broadway Junction in Brooklyn and 8 Av in Manhattan is replaced by the M14 and free shuttle buses

PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE
10:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Weekends until Nov 19*
[L] Service between between Broadway Junction in Brooklyn and 8 Av in Manhattan is replaced by the M14 and free shuttle buses


[L] Service runs between Rockaway Pkwy and Broadway Junction.

Special [M] service runs all weekend between Metropolitan Av and 47-50 Sts, and via the [Q] between Lexington Av/63 St and 96 St.

[SB] Buses will run on three routes making [L] station stops in Brooklyn:
1. Between Broadway Junction and Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [M].
2. Between Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [M] and Lorimer St (Metropolitan Av [G]).
3. Loop bus serving Marcy Av [J] [M], Hewes St [J] [M], Broadway [G], Lorimer St and Bedford Av

Travel Alternatives:
For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [A] [J] [M] or, take the [G] and transfer to/from the [E] at Court Sq.

In Brooklyn, transfer between trains and [SB] buses at the following stations:
• Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [M]
• Marcy Av [J] [M]
• Lorimer St (Metropolitan Av [G])
• Broadway Junction [A] [J] | [L] (to/from Rockaway Pkwy)

In Manhattan, take the M14A or M14D for [L] stations along 14 St; transfer between trains and buses at:
• 8 Av/14 St [A] [C]
• 6 Av/14 St [F] [M]
• M14A at Delancey St/Essex St [F] [J] [M]
